# pointsOfInterest

**Instance Property**

The points of interest the template displays on the map and in the scrollable picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var pointsOfInterest: [CPPointOfInterest] { get }
```

## Discussion

You must call the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPPointOfInterestTemplate/setPointsOfInterest(_:selectedIndex:)] method to update the points of interest the template displays.

## Managing the Points of Interest

- **setPointsOfInterest(_:selectedIndex:)**: Updates the points of interest and the current selection.
- **selectedIndex**: The current selection’s index.
